text: SERVICE PROCUREMENT CONTRACT This contract is signed between ……… residing at ……………………………………………. (hereinafter referred to as “...........”) and SABANCI UNIVERSITY residing at Orhanlı 34956 Tuzla, İstanbul (hereinafter referred to as “SU”), (both institutions will be jointly referred to as the ‘Parties’) on ……….. in Istanbul with the following conditions. 1. Definition of Service to be Procured: In the scope of …………………………………………………………………………………Project carried out by SU, ……………………………………………………service will be procured by SU. 2. Delivery Time: Service will be delivered on................ 3. It is …………………………………………………..’s responsibility to ensure that services are provided without harm to goods and materials of SU and in compliance with timing criteria set forth in the articles above. 4. ............................. accepts and pledges that, its employees will be responsible for any harm caused to third parties while practicing the activities defined in this contract, it will not carry materials that could harm third parties, such as explosive / sharp materials throughout its activities in SU campus, it will not be acting as an employee of SU throughout its activities in the scope of this contract and that it will indemnify any loss that would be incurred by SU for these reasons. 5. Service price is (Gross): .............................-TL 6. Payment: Service price will be paid after completion of service, on …….. by SU. 7. Istanbul Courts and Enforcement Offices are authorized to resolve any dispute that would arise from this contract. Sabancı University ……………………………………. 1
